name: Combat_by_Samuel_plus_minus
title: Combat by Samuel + minus
author: Pi-C
description:
"Sniper and shotgun Turrets, Uranium shotgun ammo, a Sniper Gun, and more to come …"
Sometimes, less is more! This mod adds options to "Combat by Samuel" that enable you to reduce stats of sniper and shotgun turrets.

Please note: To make this mod usable with Factorio 0.18, this mod includes everything from Combat by Samuel until that mod gets updated. You can safely disable Combat by Samuel for now!
